filesystem.description: Filesystem access for course research import automation
notes: Replace YOUR_USERNAME with your actual macOS username
This grants Claude Desktop access to write research files directly to course directories
Scoped to 'courses/' directory only for security
Requires user approval for each file write operation

configuration_guide.step_1: Replace YOUR_USERNAME in the path with your actual username
configuration_guide.step_2: Add this configuration to Claude Desktop's MCP settings
configuration_guide.step_3: Restart Claude Desktop to apply changes
configuration_guide.step_4: Test by asking Claude Desktop to list files in courses/ directory

troubleshooting.permission_denied: Check that the path exists and is readable
troubleshooting.desktop_commander_not_working: Ensure Desktop Commander MCP is installed separately
